                                                                                                  com.google.gson.JsonObject properties)
                                                                                           throws OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException
        Gets the component id s that can be replaced.
        Parameters:
        app - the components of which app
        properties - the default properties to create an app instance of this app
        Returns:
        a map of the component id s that can be replaced mapped from id to key to put the next id

        OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException - on error

      • updateAppSettings

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Void> updateAppSettings​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> errorList,
                                                                                User user,
                                                                                OpenemsApp app,
                                                                                OpenemsAppInstance oldAppInstance,
                                                                                OpenemsAppInstance newAppInstance)
                                                                         throws OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException
        creates the needed components of the given app with the given config and updates components with a new configuration and deletes unused components.
        Parameters:
        errorList - a list for the errors that occur
        user - the executing user
        app - the app that should be created
        oldAppInstance - the old app instance
        newAppInstance - the new app instance
        Returns:
        the completableFuture of this task
        Throws:
        OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException
